files.patch:
@@ -687,1 +687,1 @@
-  <Event name="SafepointTimeout" category="Java Virtual Machine, Runtime, Safepoint" label="Safepoint Timeout" description="Synchronize timeout" startTime="false" thread="true" stackTrace="true">
+  <Event name="TimeToSafepoint" category="Java Virtual Machine, Runtime, Safepoint" label="Time To Safepoint" description="Time to safepoint" startTime="true" thread="true" stackTrace="true" >
@@ -689,1 +689,2 @@
-    <Field type="ulong" contentType="nanos" name="timeExceeded" label="Time Exceeded" description="The amount of time exceeding SafepointTimeoutDelay" />
+    <Field type="Thread" name="thread" label="Thread" />
+    <Field type="int" name="iterations" label="Iterations" description="Number of state check iterations" />

+#ifndef SHARE_JFR_SUPPORT_JFRTIMETOSAFEPOINT_HPP
+#define SHARE_JFR_SUPPORT_JFRTIMETOSAFEPOINT_HPP
+
+class JfrTimeToSafepoint : AllStatic {
+ public:
+  static void record(JavaThread* thread, Ticks& start, Ticks& end, int iterations);
+
+  static void emit_events();
+};
+
+#endif // SHARE_JFR_SUPPORT_JFRTIMETOSAFEPOINTEVENT_HPP
